talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh? I see now that you have some. <sp:5:1:0>But
perhaps you do not know their purpose.<sp:5:0:0>
I will explain.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> <sp:5:0:0>are a convenient means
of carrying portable Zonai devices.<sp:0:4:0>You have some already. <sp:5:0:0>But I will lend
you a few spares. You can never have
too many.
talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You have forgotten yours. <sp:5:1:0>Or perhaps you
may not even know what I mean?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Zonai capsules <clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>are a convenient means
of carrying portable Zonai devices.<sp:0:4:0>It is unfortunate that you seem to have
none. <sp:5:0:0>I will lend you a few spares.
talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>The ones I gave you were <clr:0000>fan <clr:ffff>types.<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>You can deploy them at any time.<clr:ffff> They
will generate wind when struck.<sp:0:4:0>Zonai devices are useful and come in
many varieties. <sp:5:0:0>I always carry several
with me for any occasion.<sp:0:4:0>Many neglect to keep a healthy supply
on hand. <sp:5:0:0>I keep watch for such individuals
while I maintain the mine carts.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>The spares I gave you were the last ones
I carried. <sp:5:0:0>Remember to bring more if you
return here.<sp:0:4:0>Remember that a device cannot be put
back in its capsule. <sp:5:0:0>Think carefully before
deploying one from your pouch.
talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>The ones I gave you were <clr:0000>fan <clr:ffff>types.<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>You can deploy them at any time.<clr:ffff> They
will generate wind when struck.<sp:0:4:0>Zonai devices are useful and come in
many varieties. <sp:5:0:0>I always carry several
with me for any occasion.<sp:0:4:0>Many neglect to keep a healthy supply on
hand. <sp:5:0:0>I keep watch for such individuals.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>The spares I gave you were the last ones
I carried. <sp:5:0:0>Take care not to forget again.<sp:0:4:0>Remember that a device cannot be put
back in its capsule. <sp:5:0:0>Think carefully before
deploying one from your pouch.
talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Aaah! I have not given permission to
take those.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A device cannot be returned to its capsule
once it leaves your pouch. <sp:5:0:0>Take care not
to waste capsules through careless use.
talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I am glad to hear that.<sp:5:0:0> Many forget the
necessary supplies.<sp:0:4:0>I do keep spares in case of emergency.<sp:5:1:0>
Please let me know if you have the kind
of emergency that requires them.
talk_54:
...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Could it be <sp:5:0:0>that you have forgotten to
bring <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>?
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The mine carts are ready for use. Activate
them using the devices contained within
your <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>.
talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Have you also forgotten to bring
<clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>I have never seen you before. This is
a loading area for mine carts. <sp:5:0:0>You can use
a fan-type <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> to get out.<sp:0:4:0>But I do not detect an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> among
your possessions.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice><clr:ffff>You cannot use Zonai devices without
an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>. The same holds true for
Zonai capsules.<sp:0:4:0>This will also make it impossible for you
to use the mine carts.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Finding an <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>should be your
highest priority.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Leaving this area is easy. <sp:5:0:0>Simply use the
<clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> I gave you earlier.
talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I am sure there was a Maker Construct
at the pond at the foot of the mountain.<sp:5:0:0>
I believe it had spares available.
talk_57: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Perhaps you could pay it a visit.
talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Greeting_00>Have you still not acquired an
Energy Cell?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice><clr:ffff>You will not be able to use Zonai devices
without one. Zonai capsules will also be
a problem for you.<sp:0:4:0>It is currently impossible for you to use
a mine cart.<sp:0:4:0>You should work on finding an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_59:
Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>You do not seem to have an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>yet.<sp:0:4:0>No <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>means no <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
That will pose a problem when it comes to
using this mine cart.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Return here once you have found an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>This is a mine-cart station. <sp:5:0:0>Excavated
resources can be transported from here.
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Yes. <sp:5:0:0>They are the convenient capsules
I gave you containing Zonai devices.<sp:0:4:0>Be aware that I have no more spares
to provide.
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Yes. <sp:5:0:0>They are the convenient capsules
I gave you containing Zonai devices.<sp:0:4:0>Be aware that I have no more spares
to provide.
talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>This is a boarding area for mine carts.<sp:5:0:0>
It is the loading point for any excavated
materials you want to transport.
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You have returned. <sp:5:0:0>And you still do not
have an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This mine cart will not function without
one. <sp:5:0:0>Nor will the <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> that rely
on it for power.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>Finding an <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>should be your
highest priority.
talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>You have found yourself an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This is excellent.
